entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
